dcterms:creator: Chris HolmesParker
M Taylor
Yusen Zhan
Kagan Tumer
dcterms:description: System resource allocation can be viewed as a single-step decision and optimization problem that requires mathematical reasoning capabilities of LLMs. It has numerous practical applications, such as addressing traffic congestion.
dcterms:title: System Resource Allocation

dcterms:creator: Yongchao Chen
Jacob Arkin
Yang Zhang
Nicholas Roy
Chuchu Fan
dcterms:description: The robot grid transportation task simulates the automatic control system of robots in factory assembly line operations. It involves multi-step decision-making and requires spatial and logical reasoning capabilities.
dcterms:title: Grid Transportation
